initialContent.h2: Hello! This is the TipTap Editor.
initialContent.p1: This is a modern and extensible rich text editor (WYSIWYG) built on Prosemirror.
initialContent.li2: Supports lists, headings, links, and much more.
initialContent.p2: Feel free to test the features and explore what it can do!
